name: Juggly
description: Juggly is the new juggling… without gravity! Easy to learn, hard to master, it is a game of skill, balance and creativity. Collide balls, reach high scores and master looping while finding the ultimate level beating strategy.
minimum_requirements: Mínimo: Requiere un procesador y un sistema operativo de 64 bits SO: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Procesador: 2.0 GHz Memoria: 2 GB de RAM Almacenamiento: 50 MB de espacio disponible
recommended_requirements: Recomendado: Requiere un procesador y un sistema operativo de 64 bits
